long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Airbnb Scraper is a browser extension tool that helps users search for Airbnb listings efficiently. It can extract key information from listing pages within seconds and save the structured data in CSV, JSON, and XLSX (Excel) formats to spreadsheets, greatly simplifying the listing comparison and analysis process.

The main features of this extension include:
- One-click extraction of basic listing information such as titles and host names  
- Fetch nightly prices and associated qualifiers of listings
- Collect star ratings and number of reviews for listings
- Batch download photos of listings
- Pinpoint exact addresses of listings
- List check-in/out times of listings 
- And other important details

With Airbnb Scraper, you no longer need to browse and click through hundreds of listing pages individually. All key data is clear at a glance, making it unprecedentedly easy and quick to search and compare listings. It can organize the details of hundreds of listings within minutes, saving tremendous time for finding ideal accommodations.

In addition, this extension runs fast and securely, extracting data without leaking any privacy information. It will provide great convenience for your next trip. 

Whether planning a weekend getaway or researching the market for real estate investment, Airbnb Extractor greatly optimizes and simplifies your workflow. We sincerely recommend you try this product. It will be your best Airbnb assistant!

Data Privacy
Your data stays on your device and is not stored or transmitted to our servers. We prioritize keeping your information secure and confidential.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Airbnb.com.
